body:
Comment 2 by **mypapa12**: 
Here is a smaller example, if you launch the attached file with the command: "./fl.out
-b false" I see the sentence 
"flag is true" on my screen.

It seems that there is a bug on the parsing of spaces during a boolean flag, I hope I'm
not wrong on this one...
Attachments: 1. fl.go (212 bytes)
